footer.text: Character Guide • Playstyle: Kuki Shinobu | Update Date: 09/26/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

description:
Kuki Shinobu is an Electro sword healer. Kuki scales with multiple stats, HP and Elemental Mastery for her healing, ATK and Elemental Mastery for her Skill and HP for her Burst.

Kuki is a versatile character due to her inherent synergy with Dendro reactions , She can work in Electro-Charged, Hyperbloom, Aggravate teams while also functioning as a general healer. Due to having some innate Elemental Mastery scaling she is an excellent choice in any reaction teams that want an Electro character such as Hyperbloom and Aggravate. She fulfills the role of Electro applicator and Healer easily.
title: Kuki | Playstyle
